thread.title: Easybook.com Launches Biggest Online Booking Platform “Antar Bri Merah”
thread.title_full: Easybook.com Launches Biggest Online Booking Platform “Antar Bri Merah”

author: prbuzz.com
title: Easybook.com Launches Biggest Online Booking Platform “Antar Bri Merah”
text:
In Southeast Asia, bus is considered as the most used mode of transportation since it can accommodate a large number of passengers. However, some bus passengers often complain about difficulty in terms of getting bus tickets. In line with this, enterprising students decided to find easier way to book bus tickets and they developed Antar Bri Merah which aims to provide the best bus services. Easybook.com is very happy to announce the existence of Antar Bri Merah. It is expected that more bus passengers will benefit from using this online booking platform.
Antar Bri Merah serves as the biggest and most efficient online booking platform for bus passengers. Antar Bri Merah provides bus services in different destination points and bus routes in the country, including Melaka, Seremban, Putrajaya, KLIA, Changlun and more. Antar Bri Merah offers bus services from those points to Pudu Sentral, KLIA, Putrajaya, Seremban and Melaka.
The process of booking bus ticket via Antar Bri Merah is easy. There are two steps on how to get or book bus tickets online. Bus passengers just need to find trips and choose seats. After searching their destination and seat number, bus passengers need to fill certain details and pay. When selecting trips and seat number, passengers need to choose their departure time, origin, destination and more. Such details are essential in terms of getting bus tickets.
Antar Bri Merah offers cost efficient bus tickets. It is one main reason why several bus passengers get bus tickets through Easybook.com. Booking bus ticket via Antar Bri Merah is made easier by Easybook.com. Bus passengers can pay through different payment modes such as PayPal, AXS, RHB, CIMB, MEPS, VISA and more. Bus passengers who will via pay credit card must select Option 1 while bus passengers who want to pay via internet banking should choose Option 3. After choosing the payment option, bus passengers must read the Ticketing Policy of Antar Bri Merah, enter Word Verification then pay.
Easybook.com is very proud of this online booking platform for bus passengers. Easybook.com was developed and founded by enterprising students in 2005. Antar Bri Merah can make the process of online bus ticketing easier. Over the past few years, Easybook.com has grown to be an online booking provider for getting ferry, local tours, car rental and train tickets in different countries in Southeast Asia such as Taiwan, Brunei, Indonesia, Thailand, Malaysia and Singapore.
For more details about Antar Bri Merah, feel free to visit http://www.easybook.com/Pages_SGMY/news/antar-bri-merah-bus-tickets.aspx .
Contact Person: James Beatie
Company Name: Easybook.com
Website: http://www.easybook.com/Pages_SGMY/news/antar-bri-merah-bus-tickets.aspx
